name: In re District Justice Bradford Clark TIMBERS, Lehigh County Magisterial District 31-2-03

parties: In re District Justice Bradford Clark TIMBERS, Lehigh County Magisterial District 31-2-03.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of June, 1997, in light of the removal of District Justice Timbers from office, this matter is dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
697 A.2d 577
In re District Justice Bradford Clark TIMBERS, Lehigh County Magisterial District 31-2-03.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 3, 1997.
Decided June 16, 1997.
No. 0178 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1.
